purpleculture_pinyin:
huì
to remit; to converge (of rivers); to exchange
переводить; сходиться (рек); обменять
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 汇)
Pictophonetic: 淮 indicates the sound; 匚 (box) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
彙報 [ huì bào ]: to report; to give an account of; report
匯報 [ huì bào ]: to report; to give an account of; to collect information and report back
彙集 [ huì jí ]: to collect; to compile; to converge
匯集 [ huì jí ]: to collect; to compile; to converge; also written 汇集
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿷ Surround from left
    • 匚 [ fāng ] box; basket
    • 淮 [ huái ] a river in Anhui province
heisig_chinese_memo: Turkeys converge in a box and are shipped to supermarkets where you buy some turkey and boil it in water at home.
Ru_trainchinese:
huì: (графема) стекаться, сливаться воедино
huì: (глаг/сущ) переводить (деньги); иностранная валюта
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the little bird in the water (淮) in the side open box (匚) is whirled
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: A plastic box can allow you to converge water into one place.
humanum_full_description_en:
From "匚" to " Huai " sound. "Shuowen" thought it was a kind of container, and the paragraph notes: "It is said that there is a name for a device." But this usage is not seen in ancient books.

" Sink " can mean the meeting of currents. Such as "Shang Shu. "Yugong": "Donghuize is Pengli." Kong Chuan: "Hui, Huiye. Shuidonghui is Pengli." Tang Dynasty Han Yu "Yueyang Tower Bie Dou Sizhi": "South meets the cliffs and waters, and the north is not free. ."

The extension of " hui " means aggregation and aggregation. For example, in the Qing Dynasty, Wei Yuan "Guo Dynasty Ancient Prose Class Notes": "When the Master thought himself, it was also a collection of poetry and prose selection." "Criminal Cases. "Preface": "The name of the criminal law in the world is collected in the Ministry of Penalty. Whenever the case is directly related to the province, the Ministry of Criminal Affairs will review and discuss in detail. If there is any suspiciousness, it will help the other to prove this, weigh the object and compare it, and analyze it."

" Remittance " in modern times also indicated that the money was sent from place A to place B. For example, Chapter 13 of "The Heroes of the Sons and Daughters": "Tell them to stop sending letters and transfer the money to the students' homes." Another example is "remittance", "remittance", "wire transfer" and so on.
humanum_short_description_en: From "匚", " Huai " sound. " Sink " means the meeting of water flows, and by extension means gathering and gathering.
humanum_full_description:
從「匚」，「淮」聲。《說文》以為是一種容器，段注：「謂有器名匯也。」但古書中未見有此用法。

　　「滙」可表示水流會合。如《尚書．禹貢》：「東匯澤為彭蠡。」孔傳：「滙，迴也。水東洄為彭蠡。」唐代韓愈〈岳陽樓別竇司直〉：「南匯群崖水，北注何奔放。」

　　「匯」引申表示聚集、聚合。如清代魏源〈國朝古文類鈔敘〉：「在當日夫子自視，則亦一代詩文之匯選。」《刑案滙覽．序》：「天下刑名匯於刑部，凡直省題達各案，刑部詳加核議，苟有可疑，必援彼証此、稱物而類比之，剖析亳釐。」

　　「匯」到了近代還表示把款項從甲地寄到乙地。如《兒女英雄傳》第13回：「便叫他們止發信來，把銀子匯京都交到門生家裏。」又如「匯款」、「匯兌」、「電匯」等。
humanum_short_description: 從「匚」，「淮」聲。「滙」表示水流會合，引申表示聚集、聚合。
_purpleculture_dictionary_orig_full:
匯 (Simplified: 汇)
Pinyin: huì
English Definition: to remit; to converge (of rivers); to exchange
Total strokes: 13; Radical: 匚
Pictophonetic: 淮 indicates the sound; 匚 (box) conveys the meaning.
Character Formation:
  • ⿷ Surround from left
    • 匚 [ fāng ] box; basket
    • 淮 [ huái ] a river in Anhui province
Example Words:
彙報 [ huì bào ]: to report; to give an account of; report
匯報 [ huì bào ]: to report; to give an account of; to collect information and report back
彙集 [ huì jí ]: to collect; to compile; to converge
匯集 [ huì jí ]: to collect; to compile; to converge; also written 汇集
More: 匯* | *匯 | *匯*

Main pronunciation 主要发音: huì

Other pronunciations 其它发音: Not exists.

Original meaning 本义: Meaning (orig) a container. (now) to gather together later to remit money.

English senses 英语理解:

Usage example 用法举例: 匯款 huì kuǎn (remittance)

Importance by frequency 常用频率: 99999

Shuowen 说文解字: 器也從匚淮聲

Character decomposition 字形分解 :
Compound 匯 mutants 滙龨 from (rem- 滙 huì) and (rem- 龨 huì) from box 匚𠥓匸 fāng-xì and phonetic Anhui-river 淮 huái C239 匯<滙> B042 汇[匯彙] new-char 汇. (name- gather-together (汇)滙匯 huì)

Decomposition notes 字形分解说明 :
A confluence of rivers, thus a compendium. A container.

Simplification rule : B042 汇[匯彙]

Simplification rule explained :
new-char phonetic-phonetic 匯彙 rearanged-parts 滙匯 deleted-parts 汇滙 匯(flow together) 彙(hedgehog)

Variant rule : C239 匯<滙>

Variant rule clarification :
匯 (converge) TW 滙 <converge>

New font rule :

從「 匚 」，「 淮 」聲。《說文》以為是一種容器，段注：「謂有器名匯也。」但古書中未見有此用法。 「 滙 」可表示水流會合。如《尚書．禹貢》：「東匯澤為彭蠡。」孔傳：「滙，迴也。水東洄為彭蠡。」唐代韓愈〈岳陽樓別竇司直〉：「南匯群崖水，北注何奔放。」 「 匯 」引申表示聚集、聚合。如清代魏源〈國朝古文類鈔敘〉：「在當日夫子自視，則亦一代詩文之匯選。」《刑案滙覽．序》：「天下刑名匯於刑部，凡直省題達各案，刑部詳加核議，苟有可疑，必援彼証此、稱物而類比之，剖析亳釐。」 「 匯 」到了近代還表示把款項從甲地寄到乙地。如《兒女英雄傳》第13回：「便叫他們止發信來，把銀子匯京都交到門生家裏。」又如「匯款」、「匯兌」、「電匯」等。

匯字的基本解释

匯
huì
见“汇”①②。

匯字的汉语字典释义

[①]［huì］
［《廣韻》胡罪切，上賄，匣。］
［《廣韻》苦淮切，平皆，溪。］
亦作“滙1”。“汇1”的繁体字。
(1)河流会合。
(2)聚集；合并。
(3)迂回，围绕。
(4)通过钱庄、银号、银行等金融机构或邮电局把甲地款项划拨到乙地。
(5)方言。抽，拔。

匯字的康熙字典解释

【子集下】【匚字部】　匯； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页154第15
【唐韻】胡罪切【集韻】【韻會】戸賄切【正韻】乎罪切，?回上聲。【說文】器也。从匚，淮聲。一曰回也。【書·禹貢】東匯澤爲彭蠡。【前漢·地理志註】師古曰：匯，廻也。言滄浪之水入江，又東廻而爲彭蠡澤也。又【唐韻】苦淮切【集韻】枯懷切，?音㔞。義同。又【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?胡對切，音潰。義同。

匯字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
匯字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
exchange
huì
See "remittance"①②.
exchange
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［huì］
["Guangyun" all crimes, bribery, box. ]
["Guangyun" bitterly cut, flat all, creek. ]
Also known as "Remittance 1". Traditional Chinese characters for "汇1".
(1) Rivers meet.
(2) Gather; merge.
(3) Roundabout, around.
(4) Transfer money from place A to place B through financial institutions such as money houses, banks, banks, or post and telecommunications bureaus.
(5) Dialects. Pump, pull.
exchange
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset 2] [匚字部] 　hui; Kangxi strokes: 13; page number: page 154 15
[Tang Yun] Hu sin cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Bribery cut [Zheng Yun] Almost sin cut,? Return to the voice. [Said Wen] The device is also. Cong Yao, Huai Sheng. One said back. [Book·Yugong] Donghuize is Peng Li. [Annotation to Geography in the Former Han Dynasty] Shi Gu said: Hui, Hui Ye. It is said that the water of Canglang enters the river, and it is also called Penglize. Also [Tang Yun] bitter and cut [Ji Yun] withered and cut,? Yin 㔞. The same meaning. Also 【Ji Yun】【Rhyme Meeting】【Zheng Yun】? Hu cut, the sound collapsed. The same meaning.
